articles.description: Twitter is surveying users about the possibility of bringing Facebook-style emoji reactions to its platform. The surveys also ask about a downvote option.
articles.content:
If theres one thing Twitter needs, its a way for me to downvote my haters
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
Have you ever been scrolling through Twitter and thought, This website could really… [+2043 chars]
